meanings.definition: A round, beige-colored edible seed that is commonly used in cooking.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy eating chickpeas in my salad.
meanings.sent2: Chickpeas are a versatile ingredient in many recipes.
meanings.sent3: Why did the chickpea refuse to leave the kitchen? It was feeling a bit seedy.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bubbled up like a pot of boiling chickpeas.
meanings.sent5: The chickpea rolled off the plate, escaping its fate of being eaten.

meanings.sent1: The farmer harvested the chickpea plants in the field.
meanings.sent2: Chickpea plants need plenty of sunlight to grow well.
meanings.sent3: The chickpea plant waved in the breeze, greeting the other vegetables.
meanings.sent4: Her garden was a jungle of chickpea plants, reaching for the sky.
meanings.sent5: The chickpea plant stood tall, proud of its nutritious seeds.
